publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-851 Susan Deacon: The Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) Order 2000-That the Health and Community Care Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc) Order 2000 be approved.
